name: star trek: omg the berg
description:
Oh no! Flappy Voyager is stranded in the Delta Quadrant!

Will Flappy Voyager get home?

That's up to you.

Controls

Keyboard
Z to flap
X to pew
Arrow keys for menu stuff

Gamepad
Some controllers work. Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

Mobile devices
Non-haptic tactile interface

Features
  • Thrilling realtime action!
  • Modern physics engine!
  • Stunning graphics!
  • High fidelity sound!
  • Three game modes!
  • Other stuff!
Credits

Thanks to Serin Jameson, who is entirely to blame for Flappy Voyager and very kindly provided a high quality image for me to hoy into a low-res spritesheet.

Thanks also to ridgek, who made a silly Star Trek game that inspired me to finally get around to making one myself.

Just in case: all characters, trademarks, music, and other intellectual property rights belong to their respective owners.
